title: Sex/Life: When Porn Meets Hallmark
itunes:title: Sex/Life: When Porn Meets Hallmark
itunes:subtitle: When a viral trend about a netflix show gets us thinking if our marriages are all that
description:
Join us for our premiere episode where we introduce ourselves, talk about how this podcast came to be, and discuss Netflix's new show Sex/Life. The show gets us thinking about monogamy and if it's realistic. Can you really be monogamous and have it all? But most importantly, was that really his d*ck?


Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

Twitter: @BasicandBrain

Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain

TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain

Website: thebasicandthebrain.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
